text: The 2002–03 NSW Premier League season was the third season of the revamped NSW Premier League. ==Clubs== Teams promoted from Winter Super League: (After the end of the 2002 season.) * Rockdale City Suns Teams relegated to Winter Super League: (After the end of the 2001–02 season.) * Sutherland Sharks {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:100%;" !
